files.README.md:
# claude-ty-lsp
This marketplace provides a plugin for integrating claude code with the `ty` language server. 
## Plugin installation
### Install via Marketplace (recommended)

```bash
/plugin marketplace add jsperger/claude-ty-lsp
/plugin install ty-lsp@claude-ty-lsp
```

### Local Development

```bash
git clone https://github.com/jsperger/claude-ty-lsp.git
claude --plugin-dir /path/to/claude-ty-lsp
```

# ty-lsp
Claude code plugin for `ty`, an extremely fast python language server and type check, providing static type checking and code intelligence.

## Supported Extensions
`.py`, `.pyi`

## Installation
### Dependencies
Install `ty` globally via `uv`:

```bash
uv tool install ty
```

Or add as a dev dependency to a project:

```bash
uv add --dev ty
```

## More Information
- [ty on PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/ty/)
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/astral-sh/ty)
